hotels.title: Five-Star Hong Kong Sky-High Indulgence with Seven Award-Winning Restaurants
hotels.description: Take a moment's pause and relax at the peaceful Island Shangri-La, where signature luxury and tranquil views of the iconic Peak and Victoria Harbour make for an idyllic escape in the heart of Hong Kong. Step through the lobby doors and see the 140-year-old Banyan Tree taking up residence, a perfect greeting to this urban oasis. Seven award-winning restaurants and bars will delight foodies with a wide array of culinary delights from French fine dining at the Michelin-starred Restaurant Petrus to a bountiful buffet at cafe TOO. For artisanal cocktails, oysters and live jazz music, head to Lobster Bar for a lively night in. And when you're ready to venture out, Pacific Place Mall is just a two-minute walk away and houses many internationally renowned shopping brands, a cinema and countless food options.

hotels.vendor_name: Lanson Place Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
hotels.title: Glamorous Hong Kong Escape in the Heart of Vibrant Causeway Bay
hotels.description: Uncover a world of sparkling European sophistication just steps from Hong Kong’s vibrant Causeway Bay. As one of the most sought-after hotels in the heart of Hong Kong Island, it provides a tranquil, pastel-hued sanctuary metres from the city’s action. Discover richly styled spaces, including the hotel's chic restaurant. Flooded with natural daylight and transforming into a sophisticated nightspot by evening, Salon Lanson dishes delectable breakfasts, generous club privileges and signature cocktails curated by an in-house mixologist. Explore nearby offerings from the renowned Times Square shopping district to the lush Victoria Park. A stay at Lanson Place Causeway Bay allows you to rub shoulders with the city's trendsetters, gourmands and fashionistas.

hotels.title: Five-Star Shangri-La Hong Kong Escape in Vibrant Western District
hotels.description: A captivating mix of traditional and contemporary create a unique atmosphere at the five-star JEN Hong Kong by Shangri-La, with the bustling Western District right on your doorstep. This city haven features elegant décor and panoramic views of Victoria Harbour, and is ideally positioned with the nearby HKU Station offering easy access to key transport junctions. Expect nothing less than decadent dining options from this Shangri-La escape. The best vintage and modern elements of the bustling city are on display from the minute you step into the luxurious hotel. Reminiscences of the city’s history linger around the thriving commercial neighbourhoods and skyscrapers, with traditional markets and lavish restaurants side by side. Truly appreciate the modern and the classic in this blissful Shangri-La stay.
